name: Youtube Design Fixes (Material Design)
description:
New: you can now customize the Like / Dislike buttons and bar colors. Enjoy! :) This makes the subscribe button less of an eyesore both when subbed and when not subbed, adds green and red voting, makes the scrollbar black, and fixes some other inconsistencies (mostly with hovering icons).

DARK MODE:
The new youtube design actually has dark mode in the settings. Click here to see how to enable it.
additional_info:
2019-02-04 - Fixed scrollbar showing when fullscreen
2018-06-09 - ADDED like/dislike color customizability, applied styling to the new Sponsor button, fixed hover on notif icon
2017-10-04 - Fixed sub button, YT must have changed something.
2017-08-08 - Fixed username hover (was black)
2017-05-12 - ADDED green and red voting buttons, minor fixes.
2017-05-04 - update for missing button hovers (sorting, commenting, description show more, notification icon, show more comments, reply buttons).
2017-05-04 - initial release, makes the sub button nicer.
